data.text: @drkunalsehgal Sir, please know that fares are dynamic in nature and may increase or decrease at any given time as per the requirement and availability. We request your understanding.~ Nandita

data.text: @shantanusomani Mr Somani, as checked, your flight isn't cancelled and is operating as per the schedule. Please visit https://t.co/6AeiBVC5MJ to check your flight/ booking status and let us know via DM in case you need more assistance. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK

data.text: @kyrocks22 Hi, we never wish to separate a family flying together by assigning separate row seats. But auto seat selection will assign seats as per availability with no charge. You may select a preferred seat at a nominal fee while web check-in. ~Ojasvi

@xyzcrypto Hi, you may carry it in check-in baggage. ~Ojasvi
@GauravC68099954 Mr Chaudhary, it's never our intention to disrupt the plan of our passengers. Please allow us some time to get this checked and we'll get back to you with an update. ~Ojasvi

data.text: @planetravelover Hi, please share your PNR via DM so we can check and assist. Thanks. ~Ojasvi
@Gandharv_Kohli Mr Kohli, we understand this shouldn't have happened. We're raising this to the concerned team right away for necessary review. We hope to serve you better in the future. ~Linda
@Pramodvai Sir, our inflight team can allocate XL seats to corporate travellers only at 50% discount on the seat fee. We hope this clarifies your doubt. ~Linda

@SumitBagaria8 Further, the flight is delayed by 20 mins due to the late arrival of the incoming aircraft. The flight will be airborne any moment. Going forward, your baggage is tagged as fast forward. Do let us know via DM for any further assistance. ~Linda (2/2)  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK

@SumitBagaria8 Mr Bagaria, sorry to note your travel experience. Please be informed, Airbus A-321 has different configurations and you're right, 27th row is the exit row in this particular aircraft. Thus, we have refunded the seat fee to the same mode of payment. (1/2)
@pareekshit_vaid Hi, you may carry the same in cabin baggage. ~Ojasvi
@joshiley_ankur Mr Joshi, we regret the inconvenience caused. We request you to share your PNR via DM and we'll assist you at the earliest. ~Ojasvi
@AudumbarBhoi Sir, this is not the service we intend to provide. Please help us with your PNR via DM and we'll get back to you at the earliest. ~Ojasvi
@Kajalj1894 We sincerely look forward to your understanding. ~Snigdha 2/2 ~Snigdha

@Kajalj1894 Ma'am, we truly understand missing a flight could be stressful. Please know that our counter closes 1 hr prior to the flight departure. As you reported late, therefore, our team was unable to accept you on the same flight. 1/2
@uncommonsurname Hi, we are concerned to hear this. We request you to DM us in detail and we'll assist you at the earliest. ~Ojasvi

@ArindamGRoy Sir, we regret the hassle. We request you to note that the boarding gate closes 25 mins prior to the departure. Since you reported 17 mins prior to the scheduled departure, our staff was unable to accept you on the flight. We hope for your understanding. ~Ojasvi

@TanujeetDasgup2 Mr Dasgupta, we believe our airport team tried to assist you to the best of their abilities. However, the compensation offered was turned down by you. We're not in the stage to offer otherwise from what has been offered already. We look forward to your understanding. ~Linda
@Sd62034322 Yes, you may carry them in check-in luggage. ~Ojasvi
